alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 11:39AM MST until October 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST/NOON PDT/ FOR SOUTHWESTERN LA PAZ...WEST CENTRAL YUMA AND EAST CENTRAL IMPERIAL COUNTIES... At 1139 AM MST/1139 AM PDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winterhaven, or 11 miles southwest of Martinez Lake, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern La Paz, west central Yuma and east central Imperial Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
